com.kevalpatel2106.emoticongifkeyboard.internal.emoticon

Class EmoticonDbHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.readystatesoftware.sqliteasset.SQLiteAssetHelper
        • com.kevalpatel2106.emoticongifkeyboard.internal.emoticon.EmoticonDbHelper

  • final class EmoticonDbHelper
extends com.readystatesoftware.sqliteasset.SQLiteAssetHelper
    Created by Keval on 21-Aug-17. This class implements SQLiteAssetHelper to load the emoticons list database from assets/database folder. This database is pre-loaded in the library with three tables:
  • All emoticons list with unicode and name of emoticon.
  • List of all emoticons variant.
  • List of all search tags with the respective unicode.
Author:
'https://github.com/kevalpatel2106'

    • Method Detail

      • getEmoticons

        @NonNull
ArrayList<Emoticon> getEmoticons(int category,
                                           @Nullable
                                           EmoticonProvider emoticonProvider)
        Get all the emoticons from the database. If the icon for the emoticon is supported by the emoticon provider then, that emoticon will be added to list.
        Parameters:
        category - Category for which emoticon is to load.
        emoticonProvider - EmoticonProvider or null for system emoticons.
        Returns:
        List of all the supported emoticons for given emoticon icon pack.
        See Also:
        EmoticonProvider.hasEmoticonIcon(String)

      • searchEmoticons

        @NonNull
ArrayList<Emoticon> searchEmoticons(@NonNull
                                              String searchQuery,
                                              @Nullable
                                              EmoticonProvider emoticonProvider)
        Get all the emoticons that matches has the search tag starting from search query. If the icon for the emoticon is supported by the emoticon provider then, that emoticon will be added to list.
        Parameters:
        searchQuery - Search string.
        emoticonProvider - EmoticonProvider or null for system emoticons.
        Returns:
        List of all the supported emoticons for given emoticon icon pack.
        See Also:
        EmoticonProvider.hasEmoticonIcon(String)
